thread.section_title: The Westbridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Week stay for work
thread.title_full: Week stay for work - Review of The Westbridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: jamessR7901ZD
title: Week stay for work
text:
Great hotel.
Staff were very welcoming and helpful.
The rooms were very great and had everything I needed for my stay. They were clean and made up in the correct way.
The breakfast was delicious and there was a lot of options to go for.
The gym was ok, not amazing but good enough to have a work out.
The location is close (walking distance) to Stratford train station and Westfield's shopping, so its easy to get around and get things you want.
